title: Drawing, "Waterhole in the Desert, Utah", 1873
medium: Brush and black wash, white gouache on gray paper.
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite, upper right corner: T. M./....May 1873.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right corner: Water in the Desert. T.M. / Utah May 1873.
description: Horizontal view of a group of horsemen approaching a waterhole, with a man seated nearby.  Group of trees, at center, in middle distance. Castellated cliffs and hills in  background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Waterhole in the Desert, Utah", 1873.
1873. Brush and black wash, white gouache on gray paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-24.
